latestPosts.title: Headless UI v1.5: The One With Comboboxes
latestPosts.description: We just released Headless UI v1.5, which includes a brand new `Combobox` component.

latestPosts.title: Automatic Class Sorting with Prettier
latestPosts.description: People have been talking about the best way to sort your utility classes in Tailwind projects for at least four years. Today weâ€™re excited to announce that you can finally stop worrying about it with the release of our official Prettier plugin for Tailwind CSS.

latestPosts.title: Effortless Typography, Even in Dark Mode
latestPosts.description: Today we're announcing the next version of the Tailwind CSS Typography plugin, which brings easy dark mode support and a brand new customization API.
